sentences.english: Have faith and confidence in the Triple Gem.

sentences.chinese: 佛法教给我们，要把感情转变成智慧。

sentences.english: His heart desired this, so he decided to go to Shewei country and learn Buddhism.
sentences.chinese: 他心中十分向往，便想去舍卫国观光并修学佛法。

sentences.english: A wise believer understands the essence of Buddhism. Those who are superstitious misinterprets the virtue of religion.

sentences.english: In the declining period of the Buddha-dharma, the first Sutra to disappear will be the Shurangama Sutra.
sentences.chinese: 《楞严经》在佛法末法的时候是先断灭的。

sentences.english: In the teachings of Buddha Shakyamuni, which sutra is the most important?

sentences.english: On the other hand there are some who try their best to work on the transmission of the dharma to the West.

sentences.english: Today we shall talk about how to end dukkha (suffering) according to Buddhism.

sentences.english: Those who don't understand the Buddhadharma must have thought that I have spoken incorrectly about this dharma.
sentences.chinese: 那些不明白佛法的人，一定认为我说的不对。

sentences.english: Hearing of the Buddha-dharma is also the concrete embodiment of the good karmas of past lives.
sentences.chinese: 闻到了佛法，也是累生累劫的善业的具体体现。

sentences.english: A wise believer understands the essence of Buddhism, Those who are superstitious misinterpret the virtue of religion.

sentences.english: While monastics are nourished mentally with Buddha Dharma every day, enjoying real bliss.
sentences.chinese: 出家人每天用佛法滋养内心才是真正的快乐。
